Title: Bordello of Blood
Writer: William M. Gaines (comic books "Tales From the Crypt"), Bob Gale (story), Robert Zemeckis (story), A L Katz (screenplay), Gilbert Adler (screenplay)
Actors: John Kassir, Dennis Miller, Erika Eleniak, Angie Everhart
Plot: The old bag of bones 'Cryptkeeper' returns for his second full length feature flick about a funeral home that's a front for a whorehouse run by vampires.
